timeline.bodyText:
Should be done for Language_vi.properties.
Also  Language.properties and  Language_vi.properties show unmatching number of changes. Kindly check
timeline.author: JaideepPalit
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -177,7 +179,7 @@ clearing.state=Clearing State
 ClearingState=New: &#10Sent to fossology: &#10Under Clearing: &#10Report available: &#10Approved:
 clearing.status=Clearing Status
 clearing.summary=Clearing summary
-clearing.team=Clearing team
+clearing.team=Clearing Team

replies.bodyText:
This is because Vietnamese translation for  clearing.team  and requesting.user is already present in Language_vi.properties,
I don't know Vietnamese, So I can't capitalize Vietnamese in Language_vi.properties,
replies.author: akapti
